channel.title: Lighthouse Baptist Church Video Podcast
channel.description: Bible Preaching from Lighthouse Baptist Church
channel.itunes:subtitle: Bible Preaching from Lighthouse Baptist Church
channel.itunes:author: Lighthouse Baptist Church
channel.itunes:summary: Evangelistic, Bible-preaching from the pulpit of Lighthouse Baptist Church in Lemon Grove, California - Pastor Doug Fisher (www.lighthousebaptist.com)

item.title: God and Country, Liberty
item.description: Dr. David Gibbs, President of Christian Law Association, preaches a Bible message on Sunday, June 30, 2013 during the Sunday morning God and Country service.
item.itunes:author: Lighthouse Baptist Church
item.itunes:subtitle: Sunday, June 30 2013 - Dr. David Gibbs
item.itunes:summary: Dr. David Gibbs, President of Christian Law Association, preaches a Bible message on Sunday, June 30, 2013 during the Sunday morning God and Country service.

item.title: Now and Then
item.description: Dr. Wayne Sehmish, Missionary to Thailand, preaches a Bible message on Wednesday, February 05, 2013 during the 2013 Lighthouse Baptist Church's Leadership Conference.

item.title: Seeds of Doubt Often Grow in the Soil of Suffering
